item.title: How to create a Linux VM in Azure?
item.description: Create a new account in Microsoft Azure. For new users, Azure gives free credits for 30 days and many services free of cost upto a limit for 12 months. For students, Microsoft also give away many resources and azure credits. You just have to reach to them by their email. Login to your azure account. Step 1 Search for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS In the search bar, search Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and select create.
